ComicInfo.Summary: Jackie Estacado has barely completed his training with RIPCLAW, when THE DARKNESS is forced to battle THE CONQUISTATOR and his legion of Hostile Cherubs! But will even these two be enough to stem the coming Blood Tide -- or is Jackie going to have to look towards his sister Capris for help!?
ComicInfo.Tags: Frankie Franchetti,Jenny Romano,Capris Castiglione,Jackie Estacado,Sonatine,Ripclaw,The Franchetti Family,Darklings,Wenders
ComicInfo.Title: Ripclaw (Part Five)
